Package backend

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
backend.PollyObject
backend.ColorfulObject
backend.Animation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FadeAnimation, TranslateAnimation
public abstract class Animation
extends ColorfulObject
implements java.io.Serializable
Allows for multiple objects to be treated as a unit and apply changes over time to each of its constiuent members.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Animation

      public Animation​(processing.core.PApplet sketch, long duration)
      Constructor for Animation
      Parameters:
      sketch - a reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library
      duration - the duration in milliseconds of the animation

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      protected void addMember​(PollyObject newMember)
      Add the current annimation sequence to an object.
      Parameters:
      newMember - The desired object to add the annimation to

    • removeMember

      protected boolean removeMember​(PollyObject member)
      Remove the current annimation sequence from anobject. The annimation for the other objects in the unit is preserved.
      Parameters:
      member - The desired object to remove the annimation from
